meanings.definition: A person who is mentally ill, especially one who is violent or dangerous.
meanings.sent1: The town was terrified of the lunatic who escaped from the asylum.
meanings.sent2: The police were called to handle the situation involving a dangerous lunatic.
meanings.sent3: The lunatic's attempt to juggle knives was both dangerous and foolish.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a chaotic storm, a lunatic whirlwind of violence and unpredictability.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lunatic's wild eyes haunted the townspeople for years to come.

meanings.sent1: She had a lunatic idea to build a roller coaster in her backyard.
meanings.sent2: The plan to paint the house neon green seemed quite lunatic to the neighbors.
meanings.sent3: His lunatic dance moves at the party had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The colors clashed in a lunatic fashion, creating a visual disaster.
meanings.sent5: The lunatic design of the building made it stand out in the city skyline.
